players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Bob, we need to vote Charlie today or we lose."

Charlie: "Bob, this is an obvious ploy—Diana conveniently claims a result on the only person who can’t refute at night. If she were real, why out now with no risk? Let’s not rush a mislynch—vote Diana."

You: "Claims are Diana=Detective (Charlie maf), Charlie=Diana is lying. Diana: why claim D1 with only 1 kill? Charlie: what’s your counter if Diana’s true? Any night-action details? I’m leaning Diana but want answers."
Diana: remained silent.

Charlie: "Bob, note Diana went silent when pressed. Real detectives share specifics: when/why they checked me, any breadcrumbing. She gave none. One mafia left—misvote ends game. Best play: vote Diana, reassess tomorrow."

You: "Leaning Charlie scum. Diana’s silent but early CC risk fits a real det. Charlie, answer: if Diana flips det, who’s mafioso then? Also, why would scum-Diana claim with only 1 misvote needed? I’m voting soon—final thoughts?"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie

players.name: Diana

Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

Bob: "Claims are Diana=Detective (Charlie maf), Charlie=Diana is lying. Diana: why claim D1 with only 1 kill? Charlie: what’s your counter if Diana’s true? Any night-action details? I’m leaning Diana but want answers."
